title: Founder & Lead Developer
highlight: iOS + web platform for social discovery
details: Architected and developed an iOS app using SwiftUI/UIKit with a Next.js companion web interface, enabling seamless cross-platform user experiences.
Designed scalable backend with Firebase Authentication, real-time database, and Azure services for fast, reliable data management.
Integrated Crashlytics and a custom logging framework to track performance, debug issues, and guide iterative improvements.
Built automated CI/CD pipelines for builds, tests, and deployments, reducing release cycles from days to hours across iOS and web.
Led design and product decisions, ensuring a clean, modern UX while setting up the foundation for future feature expansion.

title: POKE Travel Hub
details: Built an Expo-based cross-platform app consolidating weather, baggage limits, and airport delay data into a single travel resource.
Integrated OpenWeatherMap API and geolocation to deliver real-time local forecasts tailored to user position.
Implemented live airport delay search with AviationStack API, giving travelers real-time flight statistics by airport code.
Scraped and cached airline baggage policies for instant lookups, reducing repetitive API calls and improving app responsiveness.
Developed Python Flask backend with caching, rate-limiting, and secure API key management to handle heavy traffic efficiently.

title: ShuttleBus
details: Integrated Google Maps API to visualize shuttle routes and live vehicle positions with interactive stop markers.
Built PHP/MySQL backend services to manage schedules, track vehicles, and serve JSON endpoints for the front-end.
Developed a responsive UI where students could search shuttle stops, view ETAs, and follow buses in real time.
Optimized location updates with AJAX polling every 5 seconds, minimizing latency and ensuring smooth map transitions.

title: T&J Apparel
details: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform in a 2-person team supporting Users, Sellers, and Admins with role-specific permissions.
Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control, enabling sellers to manage their inventory and admins to oversee all records.
Developed features for product browsing, purchasing, order history, and seller dashboards to improve usability.
Enhanced UX with responsive layouts, client-side validation, and dynamic product pages for seamless shopping experiences.

title: Workout Buddy
highlight: MERN stack app for secure workout tracking
details: Developed a full-stack MERN application for secure workout logging, authentication, and user dashboards.
Implemented password hashing and JSON Web Tokens for secure login, with protected routes safeguarding user data.
Built CRUD features for logging workouts, reviewing history, and editing past sessions with timestamp accuracy.
Added CSV export functionality, allowing users to analyze their workout history outside the app.
